trans_title: 疫苗黑幕：从隐瞒到灾难
introduction: An investigation into how the CDC (Centers for Disease Control and Prevention), the government agency charged with protecting the healt h of American citizens, destroyed data on their 2004 study that showed a link between the MMR vaccine and autism. This alarming deception has contributed to the skyrocketing increase of autism, potentially the most catastrophic epidemic of our lifetime. Written by Anonymous
chinese_title: 疫苗黑幕：从隐瞒到灾难
